alert.note: Alert for Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 11:58PM CDT until March 25 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR WINSTON COUNTY... At 1157 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moreland to near Winston Free State Barn to near Lynn, moving east at 65 mph. A wind gust of 59 mph was recently measured in Haleyville. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Haleyville, Lynn, Arley, Double Springs, Addison, Houston Recreational Area, Nesmith, Brushy Lake, Helicon, Inmanfield, Ashridge, Sardis, Corinth Rec Area, Needmore, Moreland, Winston Free State Barn, Smith Lake, Houston, Natural Bridge and Posey Field Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
